alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Eastern Black Range Foothills; Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin; Upper Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 03 at 3:44AM MDT until November 03 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT... Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gust up to 45 mph. * WHERE.. Upper Gila River Valley, Southern Gila Foothills/Mimbres Valley, Southwest Desert/Lower Gila River Valley, Southwest Desert/Mimbres Basin, Eastern Black Range Foothills, Sierra County Lakes-Northern Dona Ana County, Central Tularosa Basin * WHEN...From noon today to 10 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS... Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Eastern Black Range Foothills; Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin; Upper Gila River Valley
